ProjectList.Name: Ongoing Tactics RPG
ProjectList.Description: Tactics JRPG with dozens of playable characters and base building elements. Deploy your units, fight opponents in large square grid maps, and unravel a complex story as you decide the fate of the world. Inspired by game series such as Final Fantasy Tactics, Tactics Ogre, Fire Emblem, Vanguard Bandits, etc. A large passion project, still far from finished.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Walking gameplay (moving around base/cities in 3D movement)
*Map movement on grid during battles
*Pathfinding and movement on world map
*Base management with building/placing shops/decorations
*Camera controllers for all contexts above
*Visual novel-style full dialogue system using 3D models
*Enemy AI (Goal-based agents with utility function)
*Lots and lots of UI windows, accepting both mouse and joystick interaction
*Inventory management and equip system
*Friendship/romance system between characters
*Lua scripting integration for skills/traits with buffs, debuffs, status ailments, positional effects, etc.

ProjectList.Name: Social Sass
ProjectList.Description: Small oldschool turn-based JRPG where you take on quests and fight enemies using microblogging as a weapon

ProjectList.Name: Praise Thy God
ProjectList.Description: Arcade style rhythm game about a holy knight praying for their god. As said god, play the right keys in time to fight off the enemy undead.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Rhythm gameplay
*Score system
*UI
*Second programmer in the team worked on the enemy movement and the special attack

ProjectList.Name: Dorimon
ProjectList.Description: Pokemon-like 3D RPG prototype with working wild monster and trainer battles.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Overworld topdown movement and object/trainer/dorimon interaction
*Turn-based Battle Mechanics
*Pokemon-style mechanics (typing system, switching out monsters)
*Lua scripting integration for moves with effects, buffs, debuffs, status ailments, field effects, etc.

ProjectList.Name: Ars Vocandi
ProjectList.Description: Digital card game with over 70 cards. Summon creatures, upgrade them, and cast spells in order to take down the enemy summoner. Each creature has 3 different stats that can be used to attack, and attacks are performed by both players rolling dice.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Base Gameplay
*Card drawing and movement
*Card interaction
*UI
*Implemented all card effects
*Implemented enemy UI

ProjectList.Name: Justine Time
ProjectList.Description: Short 2D puzzle platformer game about a little witch who uses time-slowing magic to try to save cute animal familiars. Approaching any objects in the world makes them move at normal speed, both friendly and hostile.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Base Platforming Gameplay
*Time slowdown/speed-up mechanics
*Climbing/Carrying mechanics
*UI
*Level Design

ProjectList.Name: Doomsday Machine
ProjectList.Description: Inspired by "Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes", but played locally. One player must play the game on their machine, while the other reads the manual and gives instructions based on audio and visual cues. Failure in operating the machine correctly or running out of time will lead to the end of the world.

ProjectList.Name: Sweet Dreams
ProjectList.Description: Arcade style twin stick shooter. Fight off enemies in the arena and collect coins to buy better weapons in between enemy waves using the in-game shop.

ProjectList.Name: glEscape()
ProjectList.Description: Arcade style 2D platformer with procedural stages. Fight enemies, avoid obstacles and advance as far as you can without dying.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Procedural generation of stages
*Base Gameplay
*All player forms and different abilities
*Enemy AI
*UI

ProjectList.Name: Urd Monster
ProjectList.Description: Simple 2D topdown stealth game where you are the monster. Control Urd and save her monster friends.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Base Movement
*Enemy Node-based Navigation
*Enemy AI (state machine, sight range, can be baited/distracted)
*UI
*Level Design

ProjectList.Name: Our Home is GGJ
ProjectList.Description: Digital card game for two players, played locally. Inspired by the Global Game Jam, both players play cards and race to see who can finish their jam game faster.
ProjectList.Responsibilities:
*Base Gameplay
*Card Movement (drawing from deck, using cards)
*Card effects
*UI
*EN-US and PT-BR Localization
